mapper.select: SELECT COURSECODE, COURSENAME, STARTDATE, COURSECNT FROM COURSE ORDER BY STARTDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COURSE(COURSECODE, COURSENAME, STARTDATE, COURSECNT) VALUES ((SELECT 'C'|| EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) ||LPAD((TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(COURSECODE),6))+1),5,0) FROM COURSE), #{coursename}, #{startdate}, (SELECT MAX(COURSECNT) FROM COURSE WHERE COURSENAME=#{coursename})+1)
